title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, June 22, 2020
description: It's the birthday of Erich Maria Remarque (Germany, 1898), who is best known for his anti-war novel “All Quiet on the Western Front.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of Erich Maria Remarque (Germany, 1898), who is best known for his anti-war novel “All Quiet on the Western Front.”
